Name: Cycle of The Moon
About the game: In Cycle of The Moon, you fight your way through a map, trying to get to the boss and defeat him. However, you have to be careful, for the thirst of a vampire is constant. Features : Thirst During the game your character has a constant Health Loss effect, refill your health by killing any Npc. Souls Any Npc that can die has a chance of dropping their Soul. These effects can range from Increasing your max HP, Stamina, Decreasing the amount of hp you lose over time from thirst, or even a new Attack! New attacks Unlock new attacks by either the enemy dropping a soul that unlocks a triple attack, which is a triple swing that needs to be timed. Or by finding the other one out in the world! Humans There's a village with humans, which heal you for more than normal enemies would, however killing them also has a chance of spawning soldiers that will hunt you down The boss The goal. Reach the boss at the end, gather enough souls to become powerful enough, and beat the Harbinger of the Moon! This Project was made by 3 students in about 45 days To use a controller you might have to enable the support for your controller in the steam setting under controller tab, and then go under the general controller setting and enable the support for your specific controller. If that doesn't work we recommend DS4Windows
